thread.title: DotCMS Web Content Management System Wins Designation on the 20 Most Promising Open Source Solution Providers list by CIO Review
thread.title_full: DotCMS Web Content Management System Wins Designation on the 20 Most Promising Open Source Solution Providers list by CIO Review - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: DotCMS Web Content Management System Wins Designation on the 20 Most Promising Open Source Solution Providers list by CIO Review
text:
Information contained on this page is provided by an independent third-party content provider. WorldNow and this Station make no warranties or representations in connection therewith. If you have any questions or comments about this page please contact pressreleases@worldnow.com .
SOURCE dotCMS
Pioneers in open source content management systems software, dotCMS is designated as one of the 20 Most Promising Open Source Software Solution Providers for 2015.
MIAMI , Oct. 8, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- DotCMS, makers of Java open source content management system software has been chosen as one of the 20 Most Promising Open Source Software Solution Providers by CIO Review. The announcement came today highlighting a select group of software vendors that have excelled in open source business models.
CIO Review's list showcases the 20 Most Promising Open Source Software Solution Providers that deliver market-leading solutions and are built and offered on an open source foundation. CIO Review's editorial board and a panel of expert advisors compiled the list with the goal of recognizing and promoting outstanding open source technologies.
"DotCMS has been on our radar for some time now for inspiring a revolution in the content management space and we are happy to showcase them this year due to their continuing excellence in delivering top-notch CMS technology," said Jeevan George , Managing Editor, CIO Review. "It's clear dotCMS has been delivering a high degree of value to businesses across the globe in an open source model. We're excited to have them featured on our list of top companies."
DotCMS CTO, Will Ezell commented on the news, "Most people don't realize that we have deep roots in open source software dating back to projects we started in 2001. Our roots and our product philosophy today follow closely with that open source approach. We've always promoted the ideas of removing barriers, open access to content and giving developers and digital marketers the tools and freedom to innovate."
The list and feature article are available on the CIO Review website: http://magazine.cioreview.com/October-2015/Open-Source/ and a reprint of the article is available for download on the dotCMS company website: http://dotcms.com/company/news/dotcms-wins-designation-as-most-promising-open-source-solution-provider
About dotCMS
DotCMS is a leading Java open source content management system. The company is privately owned and headquartered in Miami, Florida and has an active open source community that has generated more than 300,000 downloads. The open source software is available for download on the companies website: http://dotcms.com/download
